scenario_text.value: Aoi’s really important to everyone, huh?

Yeah, that’s probably why she’s so concerned
about staying safe, and works so hard for us.

Well, I’m going to work harder for everyone
else, too!
Yeah! Let’s both try and be more like Aoi!
Hey, no fair! I want to be more like her too!
Um... I’m right here, you know?
